title: [Self-directed] Digital Technology-Based Cognitive Process Optimization Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with digital tools and foundational cognitive science knowledge
context.additional_context: Focuses on how managers can use digital technology to manage cognitive load in complex decision-making processes.

learning_goals: Present three examples explaining how digital tools influence attention, memory, and cognitive processes.
Identify two cognitive biases that may arise from excessive use of digital technology within an organization.
Apply a four-step analytical framework to evaluate technology integration from a situated cognition perspective.
Design three digital-analog interaction strategies specifically for a work environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
